item.title: Recalling My Middle School Alma Mater
item.description: This post is translated by deepseek and chatgpt. My middle school alma mater celebrated its 25th anniversary on April 19th. I’m not entirely sure why the date was April 19th instead of September 1st, the start of the autumn semester. But never mind—let future historians figure that out. Six Years of Middle School – Boarding Lifen My alma mater was also called the Experimental Middle School,so I’ll refer
